Departmental Promotion Committee

As per the Government Order No: 171-HUD of 2010 dated 12-05-2010, the Departmental Promotion Committee in SDA constitutes following Members:

S.NoMemberDesignation
1Vice Chairman, SDA Chairman
2Special Secretary to Govt, H&UDDMember
3Secretary, SDAMember
4Secretary, SDAMember
5Financial Advisor/CAO,SDAMember
6Administrative Officer, SDAMember Secretary
